description:
Summary:

The groups in group section from the navigation bar are unsorted manner which makes it complex to search through the particular group during online mode.

Steps to reproduce:

For instance

Run the app
Open Navigation Bar
Select Groups
Expected behavior:

Lexicographically sorted entries for easier lookup.

Observed behavior:

Unsorted entries make search difficult.

Device and Android version:

Android 5.0.2, API 23
name: Mifos Android Client Bug Fix: Groups are not in sorted way
